person.persName: Jacob Hawthorne (Newport, Campbell Co merchant and legislator)

body.p: Newport, Kentucky merchant and legislator. Virginia native. Married Mary L. Southgate Hawthorne in 1842. Father of Ann Hawthorne, Virginia Hawthorne, Margaret Hawthorne, Richard Hawthorne, and Jacob Hawthorne. Store clerk in Wheeling, Virginia as a youth. Moved to Kentucky in 1837. Partner with Richard Southgate in mercantile firm Southgate, Hawthorn & Co. to 1857. Served in the House of Representatives of the General Assembly of Kentucky from 1862 to 1867.
